name: Glace
description:
Operating system must be set for Windows XP to run the game.
Additional libraries must be installed for sound to work.
content:
files:
- file1: https://archive.org/download/Glace/GlaceSetup12.exe
game:
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Glace/Glace.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    app: winxp
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: directmusic
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: directplay
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    executable: $file1
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
